title: Matomo Analytics
shortDescription: Amazing insights on your users and website activity to grow.
longDescription:
Matomo Analytics (formerly Piwik) requires an additional open source software installed on your server.
Alternatively, start a free trial on our reliable and secure Matomo Analytics Cloud.

This app will automatically add the Matomo tracking code to your website and track your visitors into your Matomo so you can get a 360 degree view on your users and customers. Increase your conversions, sales, and revenue with all the insights you get. Matomo gives you 100% data ownership and much more: * Track all page views and visits by your visitors * Set up goals to monitor your business goals Measure E-commerce sales and cart updates * Find out which marketing campaigns are the most successful * Explore where your visitors are located * Analyze which devices and software they use to optimize your website * Discover through which channels your visitors find you and which keywords they use * Determine at which time of the day they access your website the most * Monitor your site search engine and see exactly what people are looking for * See where you lose your visitors in your funnels * Slice and dice your visitors into segments * Over 100 integrations available * Supports over 50 languages * Enjoy another look & feel with themes * Dozens of premium features available to take Matomo to the next level _Learn more about Matomo Analytics or signup to get started now._
instructions:
Matomo Analytics requires an additional open source software installed on your server.
Alternatively, start a free trial on our reliable and secure Matomo Analytics Cloud.
author: Matomo.org

categories.title: Insights
categories.description: Apps that provide insight into your visitors.

piwikdomain.description: Enter the URL where your Piwik is installed, eg http://piwik.example.com
piwikdomain.title: Piwik URL

piwikidsite.description: Enter the ID of the site you want to track the data into.
piwikidsite.title: Piwik Site ID

proposedApp.title: Piwik Analytics
proposedApp.shortDescription: Tracks your website visitors in your existing Piwik.
proposedApp.longDescription:
To use this analytics app, you first need to download Piwik Analytics from [https://piwik.org](https://piwik.org/download) and [install](https://piwik.org/docs/installation) it on your server. Piwik gives you 100% data ownership.

This app will automatically add the Piwik tracking code to your website and track your visitors into your Piwik so you can get a 360 degree view on your users and customers. Increase your conversions, sales, and revenue with all the insights you get. 

[Learn more about Piwik](https://piwik.org/what-is-piwik/)
proposedApp.author: Piwik.org

piwikdomain.description: Enter the URL where your Piwik is installed, eg http://piwik.example.com
piwikdomain.title: Piwik URL

piwikidsite.description: Enter the ID of the site you want to track the data into.
piwikidsite.title: Piwik Site ID

proposedApp.title: Piwik Analytics
proposedApp.shortDescription: Tracks your website visitors in your existing Piwik.
proposedApp.longDescription:
To use this analytics app, you first need to download Piwik Analytics from [https://piwik.org](https://piwik.org/download) and [install](https://piwik.org/docs/installation) it on your server. Alternatively, you can start a free trial on our reliable and secure [Piwik Analytics Cloud](https://www.innocraft.cloud/start-30-day-free-analytics-trial).

This app will automatically add the Piwik tracking code to your website and track your visitors into your Piwik so you can get a 360 degree view on your users and customers. Increase your conversions, sales, and revenue with all the insights you get. Piwik gives you 100% data ownership and much more:

* Track all page views and visits by your visitors
* Set up goals to monitor your business goals
* Measure Ecommerce sales and cart updates
* Find out which campaigns are the most successful
* Explore where your visitors are located
* Analyze which devices and software they use to optimize your website
* Discover through which channels your visitors find you and which keywords they use
* Determine at which time of the day they access your website the most
* See where you lose your visitors in your funnels
* Slice and dice your visitors into segments
* Over 100 integrations available
* Supports over 50 languages
* and much [more](https://piwik.org/features).
proposedApp.instructions:
If you don't have an existing Piwik yet, you can either 

* download Piwik Analytics from [https://piwik.org](https://piwik.org/download) and [install](https://piwik.org/docs/installation) it on your server, or
* start a free trial on our reliable and secure [Piwik Analytics Cloud](https://www.innocraft.cloud/start-30-day-free-analytics-trial)
proposedApp.author: Piwik.org

piwikdomain.description: Enter the URL where your Piwik is installed, eg https://piwik.example.com
piwikdomain.title: The URL of your Piwik installation

piwikidsite.description: Enter the ID of the site you want to track the data into. You can retrieve the ID of your site by logging into your Piwik and going to 'Administration => Websites: Manage'.
piwikidsite.title: Piwik Site ID

clientSideDNT.description: So tracking requests will not be sent if visitors do not wish to be tracked.
clientSideDNT.title: Enable client side DoNotTrack detection
